value: about : Displays information about me
clear : Clear terminal
experiences : Display the list of my professional experiences
get-cv : Download CV in pdf format
help : Display help
hobbies : Display the list of my interests and hobbies
skills : Display the list of my skills and technologies I have experience with
dark/light : Change theme
You can use the TAB key to complete a command
You can find old commands with the up and down arrows.
